Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
Matrix
public class Matrix extends Object
Represents a matrix.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Matrix(double[][] matrix)
    instantiates a matrix from a two-dimentional array.

    instantiates an empty matrix with the desired rows and columns.
    Matrix(int rows, int columns, double fill)
    instantiates a matrix with the desired number.
    Matrix(Matrix copy)
    Matrix copy constructor

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(int rows, int columns)
      instantiates an empty matrix with the desired rows and columns.
      Parameters:
      rows - the number of rows
      columns - the number of columns

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(int rows, int columns, double fill)
      instantiates a matrix with the desired number.
      Parameters:
      rows - the number of rows
      columns - the number of columns
      fill - the number to fill the matrix with

    • Matrix

      public Matrix(double[][] matrix)
      instantiates a matrix from a two-dimentional array.
      Parameters:
      matrix - the array to initialize the matrix from

      public Matrix sub(Matrix that)
      subtract two matrices.
      Parameters:
      that - the matrix to subtract the current one
      Returns:
      a matrix resulting in the subtraction of the current by the other

      public Matrix add(Matrix that)
      add two matrices.
      Parameters:
      that - the matrix to add to the current one
      Returns:
      a matrix resulting in the sum of the current by the other

      the dot product between two matrices.
      Parameters:
      that - the matrix to apply the dot product by
      Returns:
      the dot product between the current one and the other

    • makeDiagonal

      public Matrix makeDiagonal()
      Makes a matrix where all the values are 0, except for the diagonal, which holds the values of the current row matrix.
      Returns:
      a diagonal version of the current row matrix

    • addRow

      public Matrix addRow(double[] newRow)
      appends a row to the current matrix.
      Parameters:
      newRow - the new row to append
      Returns:
      a matrix resulting of the current one with the row appended to it

    • appendAsRows

      public Matrix appendAsRows(Matrix that)
      appends the current matrix to another, as rows (below).
      Parameters:
      that - the matrix to append below the current one
      Returns:
      a matrix resulting in the the current matrix appended with the other below it

    • apply

      public Matrix apply(Function<Double,Double> func)
      Applies a function to the matrix
      Parameters:
      func - the function to apply
      Returns:
      a matrix resulting in the current one, with the function applied to it

    • parse

      public double parse()
      parses a matrix of a single number to a double
      Returns:
      the double version of the matrix

    • subMatrix

      public Matrix subMatrix(int startRow, int endRow, int startColumn, int endColumn)
      gets the a submatrix from a matrix (0-indexed)
      Parameters:
      startRow - the starting row (inclusive)
      endRow - the ending row (inclusive)
      startColumn - the starting column (inclusive)
      endColumn - the ending column (inclusive)
      Returns:
      the submatrix in the bounds set

    • splitByRows

      public Matrix[] splitByRows(double percentage)
      split a matrix into two by their rows. index 0 - from 0% to percentage. index 1 - from percentage to 100%.
      Parameters:
      percentage - the percentage at which to split the matrices row-wise
      Returns:
      an array with both of the resulting matrices

    • get

      public double get(int row, int column)
      returns the specified number on the matrix
      Parameters:
      row - the row of the number
      column - the column of the number
      Returns:
      the number on the given row and column

    • getRow

      public Matrix getRow(int row)
      returns a row of the matrix
      Parameters:
      row - the zero-indexed row of the matrix
      Returns:
      a matrix with a single row, compromised of the selected row

    • rows

      public int rows()
      Returns:
      the number of rows

    • columns

      public int columns()
      Returns:
      the number of columns
